itemListElement.name: Cranberry Blueberry upside down cake! Vegan.

@graph.name: Cranberry Blueberry Upside Down Cake
@graph.description: A cranberry and blueberry upside down cake that's simple, easy and so delicious. The perfect treat with a hot cup of tea or coffee. Vegan Recipe.
recipeYield: 2 servings (makes a 6 inch tiny cake. or 2 small ramekins)
recipeIngredient: 1 Tbsp melted Earth balance or coconut oil
1 Tbsp raw granulated sugar powdered or any powdered sugar.

recipeInstructions.text: Take 3/4 cup total fresh cranberries and blueberries or just cranberries.
recipeInstructions.name: Take 3/4 cup total fresh cranberries and blueberries or just cranberries.

recipeInstructions.text: Toss them in 1 Tbsp melted Earth balance or coconut oil and 1 Tbsp raw granulated sugar powdered or any powdered sugar.
recipeInstructions.name: Toss them in 1 Tbsp melted Earth balance or coconut oil and 1 Tbsp raw granulated sugar powdered or any powdered sugar.

recipeInstructions.text: Put this mixture in greased or parchment lined pan and in the oven at 370 degrees F to cook for 15 minutes till you mix and add cake batter
recipeInstructions.name: Put this mixture in greased or parchment lined pan and in the oven at 370 degrees F to cook for 15 minutes till you mix and add cake batter

recipeInstructions.text: In a bowl, mix in 1/2 cup whole wheat pastry flour, 1/2 cup all purpose flour, 1 teaspoon baking powder, 1/8 teaspoon salt, 1/8 teaspoon each of spices(nutmeg, allspice, cardamom or cinnamon and pinch of clove powder). Mix well.
recipeInstructions.name: In a bowl, mix in 1/2 cup whole wheat pastry flour, 1/2 cup all purpose flour, 1 teaspoon baking powder, 1/8 teaspoon salt, 1/8 teaspoon each of spices(nutmeg, allspice, cardamom or cinnamon and pinch of clove powder). Mix well.

recipeInstructions.text: In another bowl, mix 1 teaspoon flaxmeal with 2 Tbsp hot water and keep for 2 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: In another bowl, mix 1 teaspoon flaxmeal with 2 Tbsp hot water and keep for 2 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Add this flax mix to 1/3 cup water, add 1 teaspoon vinegar, 4 Tbsps raw sugar and 2 Tbsps coconut oil or softened earth balance butter, mix well for a minute till all sugar is well combined.
recipeInstructions.name: Add this flax mix to 1/3 cup water, add 1 teaspoon vinegar, 4 Tbsps raw sugar and 2 Tbsps coconut oil or softened earth balance butter, mix well for a minute till all sugar is well combined.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the flours and mix until just about combined. Add more water if the batter is too thick. The batter should be like a thick pancake batter and not too runny.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the flours and mix until just about combined. Add more water if the batter is too thick. The batter should be like a thick pancake batter and not too runny.

recipeInstructions.text: Drop batter in the hot pan with cranberries and blueberries. Spread evenly and bake for 35-45 minutes until toothpick from the center comes out clean(no batter sticks to it)
recipeInstructions.name: Drop batter in the hot pan with cranberries and blueberries. Spread evenly and bake for 35-45 minutes until toothpick from the center comes out clean(no batter sticks to it)

recipeInstructions.text: Let the cake sit in pan for 5-10 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Let the cake sit in pan for 5-10 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Remove from pan, Place upside down, drop any syrup if in the pan on the cake, and serve!
recipeInstructions.name: Remove from pan, Place upside down, drop any syrup if in the pan on the cake, and serve!

@graph.keywords: easy cake recipe, fruit cake, vegan cake recipe
